Title: The Bounty Hunter
Plot: Number forty-five "Ditched Jessie to Marry Joy" is next on the list when Jessie, Earl's ex-girlfriend returns to town seeking revenge. Earl must protect Joy in a lakeside retreat while Randy fights not to reveal their location to Jessie.
GuestStars: Juliette Lewis,  Tiffany  Haddish,  Joon Lee,  Jackson Bond,  Dana Cuomo,  Don Swayze
